callback.title: Panasonic Japan Authentication
callback.description:
**Step 1:** Click the login URL below to open the login page in your browser:

**Login URL:**
`{login_url}`

**Step 2:** After logging in with your Panasonic account, you'll be redirected to a callback URL.

**Step 3:** Copy the entire callback URL (it will look like `com.panasonic.jp.kitchenpocket.auth0://auth.digital.panasonic.com/android/com.panasonic.jp.kitchenpocket/callback?code=...&state=...`) and paste it in the field below.

data_description.callback_url: Paste the complete callback URL you received after logging in

error.invalid_callback_url: Invalid callback URL format. Please check and try again.
error.token_exchange_failed: Failed to exchange authorization code for tokens. The code may have expired. Please try again.
error.no_access_token: No access token received from authentication server
error.invalid_token: The access token is invalid or expired
error.no_fridge_found: No fridge device found in your account
